effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.
